steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8feav","text":"Prepare your samples and run SDS-PAGE as usual.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1aofu","text":"Dilute Timmons-Dunbar Buffer 1X using ultrapure water. Usually, 50 mL for each mini gel (8.4cm x 7cm) to be transfered are enough.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1kn7d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ae7de","text":"Tip: Perform all steps from this section during SDS-PAGE run","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecqg7","text":"Immediately transfer the membrane to 3% non-fat dry milk diluted in TBS-T (Tris Buffered Saline with 0.05% Tween 20) and incubate with gently rocking for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"226ju","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"3600","guid":"17FDB9CB500C4109B814EDC1AAEC422F","id":"14980","label":"Membrane blocking"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6fqdt","text":"Mix 1 mL of 'Stable Peroxide Solution' with 1 mL of 'Luminol Enhancer Solution' in a clean container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7vucb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2ueq3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":125741,"guid":"419FB12C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"SuperSignal™ West Pico PLUS Chemiluminescent Substrate","mol_weight":0,"sku":"34577","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/34577?SID=srch-srp-34577","cas_number":"","rrid":"","vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"is_public":false,"can_edit":true}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8k09t","text":"Tip: Any chemiluminescent reagent can be used","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0l4l","text":" Carefully and removing bubbles with an roller, assembly the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"77l44","text":"Bottom electrode","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7cibm","text":"6 x WypAll X60 buffer-soaked sheets","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6brva","text":"Pre-wet PVDF membrane","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"emdb9","text":"6 x WypAll X60 buffer-soaked sheets","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7713m","text":"Top electrode","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85uct","text":" Follow the picture as an guideline:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"82b3q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cve52","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"23kl7","text":"a","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fucj4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"imageblock","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D9B929A2013B46AA8619BFB7B9CF3F22","height":"222","is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":"TransferAssembly.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/w5ej2me.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/w5ej2me.png","width":"509"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8noh1","text":"Soak 12 WypAll X60 sheets (cutted in gel size) in Timmons-Dunbar Buffer 1X.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bcvvo","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":125740,"guid":"419FB0DA341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"Wiper Wypall X60 Quartfold","mol_weight":0,"sku":"34865","url":"https://www.kcprofessional.com/products/wipers/extended-use-cloths/34865","cas_number":"","rrid":"","vendor":{"id":346,"name":"Kimberly-Clark","link":"http://www.kimberlyclarkprofessional.com","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"is_public":false,"can_edit":true}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1h4bb","text":"Pre-wet PVDF membrane (cutted in gel size) for 30 seconds in 100% methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4mvmc","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a6ut7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":4166,"guid":"4106AE99341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"Immun-Blot® PVDF Membrane 0,2µm","mol_weight":0,"sku":"1620177 ","url":"http://www.bio-rad.com/de-de/sku/1620177-immun-blot-pvdf-membrane-roll-26-cm-x-3-3-m","cas_number":"","rrid":"","vendor":{"id":41,"name":"Bio-Rad Laboratories","link":"http://www.bio-rad.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"is_public":true,"can_edit":false}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"30","guid":"74044F2B19B549BB8739C7A53697A513","id":"14979","label":"Membrane activation"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71b9q","text":"Discard the methanol and overlay membrane with Timmons-Dunbar Buffer 1X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"apgul","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3flgp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bv0f2","text":"Membrane will usually float","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6in6b","text":"Remove gel from electrophoresis chamber and disassembly the sandwich","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5rahp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":3,"offset":3,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f6gcv","text":"Do not wash the gel! Remaining SDS is important for protein transfer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82sc2","text":"Perform the transfer at 0.325 mA/mm2 for 7 minutes when using 0.75mm mini gels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":35,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cgeq5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4156d","text":"The following table (From Trans-Blot Turbo Blotting System (Cat #170-4155) manual) is quite usefull:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4mp2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8u3n4","text":"   Protocol Name MW (kDa) Time (min) 2 Mini Gels or 1 Midi Gel 1 Mini Format Gel   0.75 mm thick gels \u003e 150 10 2.5 A; up to 25 V 1.3 A; up to 25 V   Mixed 7   \u003c 30 5   1.5 mm thick gels Any 10   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":25},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":195}],"data":[]},{"key":"5l2da","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","0_4":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","1_4":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","2_4":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","3_4":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":"","4_4":""},"colWidths":[151,64,54,116,104],"data":[["\u003cstrong\u003eProtocol Name\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003eMW (kDa)\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003eTime (min)\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003e2 Mini Gels or 1 Midi Gel\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003e1 Mini Format Gel\u003c/strong\u003e"],["0.75 mm thick gels","\u0026gt; 150","10","2.5 A; up to 25 V","1.3 A; up to 25 V"],["Mixed","7",null,null,null],["\u0026lt; 30","5",null,null,null],["1.5 mm thick gels","Any","10",null,null]],"guid":"E8D8B7B0B72511E88916D1DB482D0BED","mergeCells":[],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13qcj","text":"Disassembly the sandwich and proceed with blocking and antibody incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b126e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bd61n","text":"Tip: Membranes can be stained with Ponceau S to check protein transfer and binding. Gels can be checked for protein leftover by Coomassie Blue staining.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9n66b","text":"Pour off washing solution and overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 2/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ig2r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"jan1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"B0F3CB3176C9426FAF663171581DA343","id":"14981","label":"Wash (1/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdks6","text":"Pour off washing solution and overlay with desired antibody. Incubate from 1 hour (room temperature) up to 16 hours (4°C) with gently rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a9vu0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"encnu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B2ACD94C7EC24C0B8C0F501AFB56AEC1","id":"1173","label":"for overnight (16h) incubations","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"cetkg","text":"Tip: Follow manufacturer's instructions for primary antibody dilution. As a starting point, 1:1,000 dilution in TBS-T with 1% BSA (Bovine Serum Albumin) and 0.02% sodium azide (in order to prevent microorganism growth and antibody reuse).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asnv3","text":"Pour off blocking solution and overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 1/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7dui6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"kp5d","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"B037CE168A7D4BE7913D8B11BCCD1062","id":"14981","label":"Wash (1/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fv4u","text":"Pour off washing solution and overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 3/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"10tc6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"003ECD794BA9417FAE1BDAEB953EB0FC","id":"14981","label":"Wash (1/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f2be","text":"Collect antibody and store at 4°C for further uses. Overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 1/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cqjsv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"DDA145CCAC464AB3BC01D08AD79F7B9D","id":"14982","label":"Wash (2/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lv0r","text":"Pour off washing solution and overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 3/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4idn1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"57182426F16C4D199EE0DC78E262E313","id":"14982","label":"Wash (2/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jrh9","text":"Pour off washing solution and overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 2/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2unog","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"98860F3C9E4F49868758061D82112791","id":"14982","label":"Wash (2/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2dkf","text":"Gently transfer the membrane to this container using tweezers and rock for a few seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"btch0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"th84","text":"Tip: Grab the membrane by the border in order to avoid tweezer marks over the bands","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cft3e","text":"Transfer the wet membrane to the X-ray cassete. The best approach is 'sandwich' it with two transparent hard plastic foils (as picture bellow).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d0i7c","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b3fv3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3d6rq","text":"a","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1e4ak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2jab","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"imageblock","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"72C48CCBBD52458DA9F3373553DC8C93","height":"301","is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":"Cassete.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/w5kj2me.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/w5kj2me.jpg","width":"402"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ftl5t","text":"Tip: X-ray cassetes with white enchancing screens give better results","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebrn7","text":"Inside the dark room (remember to left your bright-screen cellphone outside), add one X-ray film over the assembled sandwich and expose for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8cv3g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"61j5a","text":"Tip 1: Increase or reduce exposure time as needed.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"70bmk","text":"Tip 2: Cheaper \"hospital grade\" X-ray films can be used in place of expensive \"research grade\" films.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5d7f2","text":"Remove the film from cassete and put in a container with diluted autoradiography developer solution and incubate for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eaka8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"o9ue","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"30","guid":"D87A6AFDF7044BA38E41E2550024D12A","id":"14983","label":"Developer","preset":[]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9kk2","text":"Tip: Replace solution as it becomes dark","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5lj8b","text":"Rinse with tap water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82kdn","text":"Put in a container with diluted autoradiography fixer solution and incubate for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"54tsv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"brm45","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"60","guid":"8EEF3688DF094A17B736CB87CD3B9E4D","id":"14984","label":"Fixer","preset":[]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bha9t","text":"Tip: Replace solution as it becomes yellowish","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7amj0","text":"Rinse with tap water and let it dry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1fu1j","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"333EA8A8A0F111EEBB4A02C0B41BC903","step_guid":"090B08EBD0F44F6A8095FB5AFEE5F112","title":"If exposure is underoptimal"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71eui","text":"Overlay the dried film over the original cassete sandwich to tick the prestained marker, stick to blank sheet of paper and scan it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97mj2","text":"Transfer buffer: Alcohol-free Timmons-Dunbar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aait9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9r56v","text":"Weight reagents as indicated:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"tj1q","text":"30.285 g of Tris-Base","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9tla4","text":"14.41 g of Glycine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2g3bl","text":"Transfer the reagents to a beaker, add 150 mL of ultrapure water, and stir using amagnetic bar until complete dissolution. Using a volumetric flask, complete the volume to 250 mL with ultrapure water. {"blocks":[{"key":"1mu2a","text":"Pour off washing soution and overlay with horseradish peroxidase conjugated antibody. Incubate from 1-3 hours at room temperature with gently rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7oif6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5frca","text":"Tip: Follow manufacturer's instructions for primary antibody dilution. As a starting point, 1:10,000 dilution in TBS-T.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87e","text":"Pour off the secondary antibody. Overlay membrane with TBS-T, let it gently rocking for 5 minutes (wash 1/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":109}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"en4n9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"BE30187DE8B1479A87DF1487C10B3C16","id":"14982","label":"Wash (2/3)"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1engu","text":"General Washing Buffer: Tris-buffered saline (TBS) 10X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4gagd","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6mioa","text":" Weight reagents as indicated:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"71uf2","text":"24,2 g of Tris-Base","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"48t9i","text":"87,6 g of Sodium chloride (NaCl)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f5as4","text":"Transfer the reagents to a beaker, add 900 mL of ultrapure water, and stir using an magnetic bar until complete dissolution. Using a volumetric flask, complete the volume to 250 mL with ultrapure water.
